meaningMnemonic:
When your heart <kanji>move</kanji>s then <kanji>shake</kanji>s, you’re in a state of <vocabulary>emotional turmoil</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>unrest</vocabulary>.

動揺 refers to <vocabulary>being emotionally shaken</vocabulary>, or feeling disturbed, agitated, or unsettled.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
